#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main(void) {
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);

while(t--)
{
    char a[100];
    int i,j=0;
    
    scanf("%s",a);
    
    for(i=0;i<strlen(a);i++)
    {
        if(a[i]=='a' || a[i]=='e' ||  a[i]=='o' || a[i]=='i'|| a[i]=='u')
        {
            j++;
            break;
        }
     }
    if(j==1)
    printf("yes\n");
    else
    printf("no\n");

}
	return 0;
}
